description: This file defines an abstract interface 'DataSource' for CRUD operations related to vehicles, groups, and events in a fleet management system. It specifies methods for retrieving, adding, updating, and deleting data entities, and references models such as Vehicle, BusinessGroup, and MaintenanceEvent.

classes.name: DataSource
classes.description: An abstract interface for CRUD operations in the fleet management system.

methods.name: getVehicles
methods.description: Retrieve a list of all vehicles.

methods.name: getVehicle
methods.description: Retrieve a specific vehicle by its ID.

methods.name: deleteVehicle
methods.description: Delete a vehicle by its ID.

methods.name: getGroups
methods.description: Retrieve a list of all groups.

methods.name: getGroup
methods.description: Retrieve a specific group by its ID.

methods.name: deleteGroup
methods.description: Delete a group by its ID.

methods.name: getEvents
methods.description: Retrieve a list of all maintenance events.

methods.name: getEvent
methods.description: Retrieve a specific event by its ID.

methods.name: deleteEvent
methods.description: Delete an event by its ID.

methods.name: getEventsByVehicle
methods.description: Retrieve all events associated with a specific vehicle.
